title: Frequently Asked Questions
content:
Q: Is this a digital product?  
A: Yes, you will receive an instant download upon purchase.

Q: Can I request a different size or format?  
A: Certainly! Just contact me before or after your purchase.

Q: Is it available for commercial use?  
A: No, it's intended for personal use only.

Q: Are refunds available?  
A: All digital downloads are final, but I'll promptly address any issues.

Q: Is it truly a limited edition?  
A: Absolutely—only 25 copies will ever be available. 🎨
instructions: This is the base text for the 'Frequently Asked Questions' section for the 4x5 aspect ratio. Edit the text to refine the message for this paragraph.
